Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Astros will host the Detroit Tigers in the second game of the AL Wild Card Series on October 2, 2024.
Hunter Brown is starting for the Astros and Tyler Holton is set to start for the Tigers.
The Astros' pitching staff has a collective 9.3 K/9, the third-best in the majors.
The Tigers have an 8.4 K/9 this season as a pitching staff, which ranks 21st in the majors.
